name: BURN BRIGHT
description:
In this game you are playing as a small fire spirit which is wandering in the forest, searching for some shelter. The wind is strong and cold, and you are fading slowly. Moreower, there are bear traps everywhere and you must avoid them. However, there are also some little fire sparks which you can absorb and warm yourself up.

Use W A S D to control the movement of the fire spirit. Press ESC if you want to pause the game.
